table.name: vtiger_stats
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_stats` ( `statsid` int(19) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `statsno` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `tags` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, `invite` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `invited` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `meetings` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `interest` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `meeting_sec` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `turnover` decimal(26,8) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`statsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_statscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_statscf` ( `statsid` int(19) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`statsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
